endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all available resources along with their metadata.
Create a new resource by specifying its parameters and configuration details.
Fetch the details of a specific resource identified by its ID.
Update the configuration or parameters of a specific resource.
Remove a specific resource from the system based on its ID.
Scale a resource to a specified level by providing its ID and desired configuration.
Retrieve a list of supported cloud vendor platforms for resource allocation.
Analyze and receive the performance metrics of the configured resources.
Set up networking configurations across all active resources.
Perform a health check of the service and return the system's operational status.
